refnamediv.refpurpose: Trigger Metronome with Swing and Accents

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Generates a metronomic signal with controllable swinging.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ktrig metro2 kfreq, kswing [, iamp, initphase]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: initphase - initial phase value (in the 0 to 1 range)

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kfreq - frequency of trigger bangs in cps
metro2 is a modification of 'classic' metro opcode with additional swinging. The swinging clicks can be modulated at k-rate. Also, swinging clicks can have their own amplitude value set by iamp.

note.para: metro2 as well as metro will produce a trigger signal of 1 when its phase is exactly 0 or 1. If you want to skip the initial trigger, use a very small value like 0.00000001.
